TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SamlAuthenticationStatement extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubjectStatement

Docs.summary: Represents a claim for a security token that asserts that the subject was authenticated by a particular means at a particular time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> 安全性權杖會使用 SAML 判斷提示 (Assertion) 來指定其宣告，而這種判斷指示可指定何時驗證此主體。 SAML 判斷提示中的宣告會以 SAML 陳述式表示。 SAML 規格會定義一組 SAML 陳述式型別，而其中一個為 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement>。 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement> 可判斷該陳述式主體會在特定時間以特定方式通過驗證。

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public SamlAuthenticationStatement (System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubject samlSubject, string authenticationMethod, DateTime authenticationInstant, string dnsAddress, string ipAddress, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding> authorityBindings);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubject samlSubject, string authenticationMethod, valuetype System.DateTime authenticationInstant, string dnsAddress, string ipAddress, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding> authorityBindings) cil managed

public: SamlAuthenticationStatement(System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SamlSubject ^ samlSubject, System::String ^ authenticationMethod, DateTime authenticationInstant, System::String ^ dnsAddress, System::String ^ ipAddress, System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SamlAuthorityBinding ^> ^ authorityBindings);

new System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement : System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubject * string * DateTime * string * string * seq<System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding> -> System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement
MemberSignature.Usage: new System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement (samlSubject, authenticationMethod, authenticationInstant, dnsAddress, ipAddress, authorityBindings)

Docs.param: A that represents the subject of the claim.
A URI reference that specifies how the subject was authenticated.
A that specifies the instant in time at which the subject was authenticated.
The DNS domain name in which the computer that authenticated the subject resides.
The IP address of the computer that authenticated the subject.
An of type that contains additional information about the subject.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified authentication details.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 驗證方法的集合具有擴充性；但是下表包含的是已定義於 SAML 規格中的驗證方法集合。
|驗證方法|URI| |---------------------------|---------| |密碼|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:password| |Kerberos|urn:ietf:rfc:1510| |安全遠端密碼 (SRP)|urn:ietf:rfc:2945| |硬體權杖|URI:urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:HardwareToken| |以 SSL/TLS 憑證為基礎的用戶端驗證|urn:ietf:rfc:2246| |PGP 公開金鑰|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:PGP| |SPKI 公開金鑰|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:SPKI| |XKMS 公開金鑰|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:XKMS| |XML 數位簽章|urn:ietf:rfc:3075| |未指定|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified|
當 `authenticationMethod` 參數是 `null` 時，驗證方法會設定為 `urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified`。

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void AddClaimsToList(class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim> claims) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub AddClaimsToList (claims As IList(Of Claim))

Docs.param: An of type that contains the set of claims to add to.
Docs.summary: Adds a claim based on the properties of this instance to the specified collection of claims.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AddClaimsToList%28System.Collections.Generic.IList%7BSystem.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim%7D%29> 方法會根據 `claims`、<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationInstant%2A>、<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationMethod%2A>、<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthorityBindings%2A>、<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.ClaimType%2A>、<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.DnsAddress%2A> 以及屬性，將宣告加入至 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IPAddress%2A> 參數。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property DateTime AuthenticationInstant { DateTime get(); void set(DateTime value); };
member this.AuthenticationInstant : DateTime with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the instant in time at which the subject was authenticated.
Docs.value:
，其中指定主體通過驗證的瞬間。
例外狀況型別條件
屬性設定和屬性是。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 時間是以 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 格式存放。
<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationInstant%2A> 屬性 (Property) 會對應到已在 Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) 規格中定義之 `AuthenticationInstant` 項目的 `<AuthenticationStatement>` 屬性 (Attribute)。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ AuthenticationMethod { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.AuthenticationMethod : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the method used to authenticate the subject.
Docs.value: 用來驗證主體的方法。 預設值是 。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 驗證方法的集合具有擴充性；但是下表包含的是已定義於 SAML 規格中的驗證方法集合。
|驗證方法|URI| |---------------------------|---------| |密碼|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:password| |Kerberos|urn:ietf:rfc:1510| |安全遠端密碼 (SRP)|urn:ietf:rfc:2945| |硬體權杖|URI:urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:HardwareToken| |以 SSL/TLS 憑證為基礎的用戶端驗證|urn:ietf:rfc:2246| |PGP 公開金鑰|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:PGP| |SPKI 公開金鑰|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:SPKI| |XKMS 公開金鑰|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:XKMS| |XML 數位簽章|urn:ietf:rfc:3075| |未指定|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified|
當 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationMethod%2A> 屬性設定為 `null` 時，驗證方法會設定為 `urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified`。
<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationMethod%2A> 屬性 (Property) 會對應到已在 Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) 規格中定義之 `AuthenticationMethod` 項目的 `<AuthenticationStatement>` 屬性 (Attribute)。

Docs.summary: Gets additional information about the subject.
Docs.value: 型別為 的 ，其中包含有關主體的其他資訊。

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthorityBindings%2A> 屬性 (Property) 會對應到 `<AuthorityBinding>` 項目的 `<AuthenticationStatement>` 子項目集合，而該項目已定義在 Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) 規格中。

Docs.value: 如果這個執行個體的屬性是唯讀的，則為 ，否則為 。 預設值為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 為了讓 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement> 類別的這個執行個體變成唯讀的，此時會呼叫 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.MakeReadOnly%2A> 方法。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void MakeReadOnly() cil managed

Docs.summary: Causes this instance to be read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當呼叫 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.MakeReadOnly%2A> 方法時，<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IsReadOnly%2A> 屬性會設定為 `true`，而且將無法再設定這個執行個體的屬性。

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.ReadXml%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29> 方法會設定 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationInstant%2A>、<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationMethod%2A>、<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthorityBindings%2A>、<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.DnsAddress%2A>、<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IPAddress%2A> 以及屬性。
